channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain, 9th August
item.description:
The drain in the gutter outside number 32 St Stephen’s Road is so full of vegetation that it is barely recognisable as a drain. This causes overflow of water onto the road and pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Saint Stephen's Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree in Road, 9th August
item.description:
GL51 9NJ. Tree has fallen and is blocking The Runnings. Passable by mounting the kerb
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Runnings, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: Numerous street lights out, 8th August
item.description:
Several street lights out again in the Kingsmead Close / Road / Avenue area. (There are numerous vulnerable people living in this area.)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Kingsmead Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Long deep pothole on left side of road going up hill, 8th August
item.description:
Long deep pothole about 1/2 mile up the road from Whittington / Cheltenham road on left side going up hill.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold

item.title: Rubbish bags dumped weeks ago, 8th August
item.description:
As you head towards Piccadilly farm/aggs hill from the quarry/car park, under the trees, a load of waste in bin bags has been dumped. It was across the road but someone has moved it aside so cars can pass but it is still there
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street nameplate missing., 8th August
item.description:
The name plate was attached to a frame set into the grass verge about a metre from the North Eastern corner of Hemming Way and to the Western side of number 29 Bishops Drive. The uprights and wooden cross piece ( rotten ) remain but the name plate has disappeared; it has been missing for about a month.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hemming Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
